name: dribbling
criteriaDescription: Keep close control. Change direction quickly. Protect the ball from opponents

name: Header

items.name: The technique of hitting the ball with your head.

criteriaDescription: The technique of hitting the ball with your head. Keep eyes on the ball. Use forehead to strike. Generate power with neck muscles

name: Keepie-Uppie
criteriaDescription: Use feet to juggle. Control ball height. Maintain focus
